data.message: humans really are a fickle breed lmao, we always find something to bitch and argue about when will it just be acceptable for some one to do something nice and not be judged on their earnings wether they're rich poor a donation is exactly that a donation it all counts at the end of the day, and if this is going to help children get better supplies and have a better chance at an eduction that's surely all that matters right?

replies.message: The easy and instant spread of information has effed us right up. 😲
